verbs.description: In President Donald Trump 's former life as a casino owner , he [V: might] have cheered Monday 's ruling from the Supreme Court that struck down a federal law that barred every state but Nevada from allowing betting on most sporting events . In the immigration context , this means it ca n't require state or local officials to cooperate with federal immigration ...
